title: Simple Carrot Cake Cupcakes with Cream Cheese Frosting

Ingredients.18: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature

Ingredients.19: 0.5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature

Ingredients.23: 1 mini marshmallows, colored sanding sugar, pearl sprinkles, and/or mini chocolate candies as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 18 muffin cups with paper liners.

Directions.2: Whisk together sugar, applesauce, oil, eggs, and vanilla for cupcakes in a large bowl. Sift in flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and salt; mix until well combined. Add grated carrots, raisins, shredded coconut, crushed pineapple, and pecans; mix until fully incorporated. Scoop batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling halfway.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the centers comes out clean, about 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely, about 30 minutes.

Directions.4: Meanwhile, beat cream cheese and butter for frosting with an electric mixer until smooth. Gradually mix in powdered sugar and beat until creamy. Mix in vanilla.

Directions.5: Frost cupcakes when they are completely cool; if they are even slightly warm, the frosting will melt. Decorate as desired.
